Description:
About the CompanyAvoma is an intelligent meeting assistant for business people to automate some of the common tasks required for any business meeting. We leverage NLP and machine learning techniques to summarize meeting notes and extract key topics and action items discussed.About the RoleWe are looking for a Software Engineer specialized in frontend to build the best in class user experience and work on complex frontend tasks - including but not limited toCollaborative Note Editor (like Google Docs, Notion) based on Slate and Y.js
Interactive Dashboards with plain D3, as well as Reactive Wrappers around it.
Video Player enhancements with Video.js, streaming
Performance Improvements, Caching, Bundling improvements, Github pipelines
Chrome ExtensionJob Details
